overview: Gun Hill is a BET Premiere Cinema original film produced and directed by Reggie Rock Bythewood (Biker Boyz, Daddy's Girl, New York Undercover, Get on the Bus). The film stars Larenz Tate as Bird Stevens â€“ a con who assumes the identity of his twin brother, Trane, a cop, after he's killed and goes on a search for his own redemption.
